event.title: decades of political infighting, Buenos Aires was federalized and removed

data.event: In 1880, after decades of political infighting, Buenos Aires was federalized and removed from Buenos Aires Province.
The 1994 constitutional amendment granted the city autonomy, hence its formal name: Ciudad Aut√≥noma de Buenos Aires (Autonomous City of Buenos Aires).

event.title: elected a chief of government (i.e. mayor) in 1996

data.event: Its citizens first elected a chief of government (i.e. mayor) in 1996; before, the mayor was directly appointed by the President of the Republic.
